name: Wild West Typing
description:
There are only two kinds of people in this town. Those who are dead, and those who are going to die...

"Wild West Key Fighter" is an arcade-style, third-person shooter where you must defend yourself against a horde of outlaws and bandits. To ensure you live through to tomorrow when you will hopefully find a peaceful place for you and your family, use your gunslingin' skills to defeat ruthless enemies by typing the words on the screen. As you walk through town, you encounter enemies equipped with knives, clubs, or firearms. For you to live to tell the tale, you must outdraw each and every single one of them.

If you enjoy speed typing games or experiencing the rugged environment of 19th century America, Wild West Typing is the game for you.
